required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Radiotherapy Planning System Software ---- Zeus Cloud
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter Study on the Feasibility of a Radiotherapy Treatment Planning System (TPS) Software---Zeus Cloud

collaborator.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University
The Affilicated Suzhou Science and Technology Town Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the feasibility of Zeus Cloud TPS in the design of photon intensity modulated radiation therapy (IMRT) plan for tumors in various parts of the body.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a self-control, multi-center non-inferiority study. Subjects meeting inclusion criteria have radiation treatment plans designed by Zeus Cloud TPS and Eclipse treatment planning software from Varian, respectively. The qualities of two plans are compared.
This is a observational study as the two plans are not executed.

primary_outcome.measure: The qualification rate of treatment plans based on dosimetry

secondary_outcome.measure: The conformability index of radiation dose to the target

intervention.description: Zeus Cloud TPS V1.0 is used to design the radiotherapy plan for the subjects and the plan is evaluated.
Eclipse TPS of Varian company is used to design the radiotherapy plan for the subjects and the plan is evaluated.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with confirmed brain glioma, nasopharyngeal carcinoma, lung cancer, esophageal cancer, gastric cancer, liver cancer, prostate cancer, cervical cancer and rectal cancer.
